page.title: 04BRADWELL PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: The Bradwell parish council consists of fifteen members. The present chairman, who has served for thirty three years, told us about the work of the council. Members are elected every four years. They hold meetings on the second Tuesday of each month excluding August. The meetings commence at 8 p.m. and last two hours. The public are welcome to these meetings, held at the old Bradwell school, now the Community Centre. There are five minutes at the end of the meeting for the public to put forward their views about anything they disagree with, for example, the position of the bus shelters.
